sources.title: The Remarkable Mr. Kipps
sources.description: Title: The Remarkable Mr. Kipps Summary: Kipps the draper's apprentice falls in love with a girl above his station. When he unexpectedly inherits a fortune, he thinks his dream has come true. But money can't make him a gentleman, or bring him the girl he really wants... Directed by: Carol Reed Actors: Michael Redgrave, Phyllis Calvert, Philip Frost Production Company: Twentieth Century-Fox Productions Release Date: 30 June 1941 (UK) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Kipps the draper's apprentice falls in love with a girl above his station. When he unexpectedly inherits a fortune, he thinks his dream has come true. But money can't make him a gentleman, or bring him the girl he really wants...

metadata.Plot: Kipps, the draper's apprentice, falls in love with a girl above his station. After he unexpectedly inherits a fortune, he thinks his dream has come true. But money can't make him a gentleman, or bring him the girl he really wants.
metadata.Writer: H.G. Wells, Sidney Gilliat, Frank Launder
metadata.Actors: Michael Redgrave, Phyllis Calvert, Philip Frost
